A collection of general preprocessor directives and macros.

\subsection{Detailed Description}
A collection of general preprocessor directives and macros. \begin{DoxyAuthor}{Author}
David Saxon 
\end{DoxyAuthor}


\subsection{Macro Definition Documentation}
\hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_a499ec11e7bfb5aa8909bb1db17a6dcce}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-M\-A\-C}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_a499ec11e7bfb5aa8909bb1db17a6dcce}


Directive that is defined if the current platform is a Mac operating system. 

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
The C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-U\-N\-I\-X directive will also be defined in this case. 
\end{DoxyNote}
\hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_ae454b10c5c96b60e15c761fba0d6f28d}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-L\-I\-N\-U\-X}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_ae454b10c5c96b60e15c761fba0d6f28d}


Directive that is defined if the current platform is a Linux based operating system. 

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
The C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-O\-S\-\_\-\-U\-N\-I\-X directive will also be defined in this case. 
\end{DoxyNote}
\hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_aaaf4ae9caf56cca2e8ad9da5d960e230}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-S\-T\-R\-U\-C\-T\-I\-O\-N(
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{type\-\_\-name}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_aaaf4ae9caf56cca2e8ad9da5d960e230}


Used to disable all construction methods for a class. 

This macro will explicitly delete the default constructor, copy constructor, and the assignment operator. This is normally only needed in rare edge cases for entirely static classes.

To use this macro it must be declared in the base of the desired class and the name of the class must be passed in as type\-\_\-name. \hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_afeb7437615dd8a77117dfd9e411c7235}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-D\-I\-S\-A\-L\-L\-O\-W\-\_\-\-C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-A\-N\-D\-\_\-\-A\-S\-S\-I\-G\-N(
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{type\-\_\-name}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_afeb7437615dd8a77117dfd9e411c7235}


Used to disable the copy constructor and assignment operator for a class. 

The purpose of this macro is to define classes that should not be copied. It explicitly deletes the copy constructor and the assignment operator.

To use this macro it must be declared in the base of the desired class and the name of the class must be passed in as type\-\_\-name. \hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_a5962ce6c0e98167e9b88c753f769d9e4}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-F\-O\-R\-\_\-\-E\-A\-C\-H(
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{it, }
\item[{}]{collection}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_a5962ce6c0e98167e9b88c753f769d9e4}


Performs iteration over the given collection. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em it} & The name of the iterator object that will return results. \\
\hline
{\em collection} & Iterable object that will be iterated over.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
The collection parameter must be passed in from an existing object. The collection should not be defined as the result of a function, otherwise macro expansion will cause this function to be resolved multiple times.
\end{DoxyWarning}
Example usage\-:


\begin{DoxyCode}
std::vector< int > vec;
vec.push\_back( 1 );
vec.push\_back( 2 );
vec.push\_back( 3 );

\hyperlink{_preproc_8hpp_a5962ce6c0e98167e9b88c753f769d9e4}{CHAOS\_FOR\_EACH}( it, vec )
\{
    std::cout << *it << std::endl;
\}

\textcolor{comment}{// prints:}
\textcolor{comment}{// 1}
\textcolor{comment}{// 2}
\textcolor{comment}{// 3}
\end{DoxyCode}
 \hypertarget{_preproc_8hpp_a9ba867555c7d13a317d00662e068c8bc}{\index{Preproc.\-hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}!C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E}}
\index{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E@{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E}!Preproc.hpp@{Preproc.\-hpp}}
\subsubsection[{C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define C\-H\-A\-O\-S\-\_\-\-P\-R\-I\-N\-T\-\_\-\-I\-T\-E\-R\-A\-B\-L\-E(
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{collection}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{_preproc_8hpp_a9ba867555c7d13a317d00662e068c8bc}


Prints the given iterable object to std\-::cout. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
The collection parameter must be passed in from an existing object. The collection should not be defined as the result of a function, otherwise macro expansion will cause this function to be resolved multiple times. 
\end{DoxyWarning}
